rickitickitaffy: Not only are our cycles aligned but this one has been strange for me too. I thought of you as I stood in line at Petco yesterday, and with a dress on a leak happened dripping to the floor. My immediate reaction was to run out of the store humiliated, as there were people in line. I didn't. Instead, I calmly sat my stuff down, told the folks to go ahead of me, cleaned myself up in the bathroom, came back to wipe the floor, and then resumed my spot in line. The lady rung me up, I gathered my doggie's bags and walked my happy, cramping ass to the car. Thank you @evyan.whitney for being you!
